incidents.name: Super SIM Investigating Possible Outage and Change in Data Metrics

incident_updates.body: We are seeing full recovery and issue has been resolved and operating normally at this time.

As of 16:15 UTC We are seeing full recovery and are continuing to monitor for service performance. The team identified the impact was limited to only O2 in the UK. We will provide more information on the root cause of the incident in 30 min or once more information becomes available

Since 14:28 UTC, we keep investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience regular data sessions restarts which could disrupt normal customer traffic. We are actively working to identify and resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

Since 14:28 UTC, we are investigating an issue where devices using Super SIM may experience regular data sessions restarts which could disrupt normal customer traffic. We are actively working to identify and resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Customers Unable to Send the Password Reset Email from the User Settings Page

incident_updates.body: The password reset option from Console was degraded for 5 days between 07/03/2024 10am to 07/08/2024 9:45am Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced issues sending the password reset emails from the User Settings page. The issue has now been resolved.
